publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2753 Paul Martin: Integration of the Children of Asylum Seekers in Primary Schools in Glasgow—That the Parliament welcomes the effective integration of children of asylum seekers that has taken place in Glasgow primary schools; commends the teaching and support staff for their efforts; recognises the significant achievements of gifted violinist 11-year-old Brikena Panxhi and congratulates the tutors who have assisted in developing her musical talent, and supports the representations that are being made that would assist in ensuring that Brikena can continue developing her talent in the UK. Supported by: Mr Michael McMahon*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2753 Integration of the Children of Asylum Seekers in Primary Schools in Glasgow (lodged on 15 February 2002) Robin Harper*, Andrew Wilson*
